entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 17. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 06 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. Temperature steady near minus 16.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 16. Wind chill near minus 26. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 06 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 16.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early in the evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind south 20 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 16. Wind chill near minus 26. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 06 January 2023
